author: epunzalan
msg: Revised the unit test to use its own repository cache using the appropriate repository.  Btw, this shows that the cache layout reflect the proxy configuration layout.  This is needed so that checksums on 1.x repositories are located in the same directory as the checksumed file.

author: mharwood
msg: Added XML-query-parser module for new extensible query parser that handles queries expressed as XML. Is dependent on new "queries" contrib module.

Added "queries" contrib module for various new query/filter classes. This area is also intended to consolidate existing query classes so have moved a copy of MoreLikeThis into here. Probably need to remove "similarity" module as a result, if no one objects.

author: werpu
msg: include request key made to constant

author: jglick
msg: Correct test failure when running with -ea.

author: epunzalan
msg: Made the proxy able to respond to m1 path requests
